mapper.select: SELECT ticket_purchase.purchase_date, facility_info.facility_name, sum(CUSTOMER_SALES) FACILITYSUM FROM CUSTOMER_INFO JOIN TICKET_purchase ON (customer_info.customer_id = ticket_purchase.customer_id) JOIN FACILITY_SALES ON (ticket_purchase.ticket_pub_code = facility_sales.ticket_pub_code) JOIN facility_info ON (facility_sales.facility_code = facility_info.faclility_code) WHERE PURCHASE_DATE = #{PURCHASE_DATE} group by ticket_purchase.purchase_date, facility_info.facility_name
